commitMessage:
@@@ISIS-831: digression: moving progmodel/facets into metamodel/facets

... and getting names consistent.
@@@ISIS-1257: updates facet factory to allow @Title to be added to field.  Also updated .adoc.
@@@ISIS-1409: internal components of RuntimeContext subclasses are now internal domain services; RuntimeContext hierarchy collapsed into a single class.
@@@ISIS-1427: simplifying IsisContext and minimizing calls to it; also removed Localization (unused)
@@@ISIS-2259: fixes up package name of isis-core-metamodel
